text: maybe a little over the top, but these motion graphic things are intense … a friend of mine worked on this: <https://vimeo.com/222413268>

attachments.title: Damage Control
attachments.text:
Finally, protection as progressive as you are. Koroyd® crumple-zone cylinders crush uniformly on impact, converting and absorbing more kinetic energy than traditional protection materials. 

Demand Smith with Koroyd®. Go to  to learn more.
